x="-140" y="300" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-41" value="image generation service (Cohere)" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="510" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-49" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;" edge="1" parent="1" source="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-48" target="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-9"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-48" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">Text Stream Batching</h1><div><span style="background-color: initial;">Split as soon as a sentence is ended (meaning a period is encountered) after a minimum of 50 words have been read. Pass the batch, along with the previous batches, to the next step.</span></div><div><br></div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="490" width="300" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-51" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;" edge="1" parent="1" source="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-50"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="340" y="170" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-52" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;" edge="1" parent="1" source="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-50"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="510" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="IFzgg22ONWmo3FfjsDsc-50" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">Backend-Client Communication</h1><div>Let's use websockets. It will let us send responses as they are ready, and the session overhead isn't important for a hackathon.</div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="230" y="10" width="410" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.span: Split as soon as a sentence is ended (meaning a period is encountered) after a minimum of 50 words have been read. Pass the batch, along with the previous batches, to the next step.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 408px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 392px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 116px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div: Let's use websockets. It will let us send responses as they are ready, and the session overhead isn't important for a hackathon.

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
